sn45.31:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong practice and the right practice.
sn45.31:1.5: It is wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.31:1.6: This is called the wrong practice.
sn45.31:1.8: It is right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.31:1.9: This is called the right practice.”
